title: What is a Computer ?
answeres: A computer is .. a programmable, electronic device thataccepts data (input), performs operations on that data(processing), and stores the data (storage) or results (output)as needed. Thus, these are a computers basic operations.
The term computer is derived from the word compute; thatis, to calculate
Computers follow instructions, called programs, whichdetermine the tasks the computer will perform.

title: what's Data ?
answeres: Raw, unorganized facts (can be in the form of text,graphics, audio, or video).

title: Information
answeres: Data that has been processed into a meaningfulform.

title: Information Processing

title: an emerging [research] discipline that uses tools andtechniques from the computer and information sciences to improve theacquisition, organization, and synthesis of psychological data.

a field of study involving the combination of astronomy, datascience, machine learning, informatics, and communications technologies.
